questions.text: Do you sometimes forget to take your medications?
People sometimes miss taking their medications for reasons other than forgetting. Thinking over the past two weeks, were there any days when you did not take your medications?
When you travel or leave home, do you sometimes forget to bring along your medications?
How often do you have difficulty remembering to take all your medications?
How many types of diabetes medicine (prescribed) are you taking on a regular basis?
Is there diabetes medicine you don't buy because it is too expensive for you?
Who takes care that you take your prescribed diabetes medicine?
